CustomField.description: --DEPRECATED-- Replaced by TRID_Disclosure_Category__c. Users or system populates this optional picklist field with if the customer can shop for the referenced service associated with fees, costs, or adjustments for a loan. By default, it is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select Cannot Shop Service if your customer cannot shop for this service. Select Shoppable Service if your customer can shop for this service.
CustomField.label: -D Shoppable Category
